subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Paula Creamer birdied the final three holes for a four-under-par 68 and a one-stroke lead over Angela Stanford after the third round of the Samsung World Championship in Half Moon Bay, Calif. Katherine Hull eagled the fourth hole and birdied No. 18 for a 69 to stay two strokes behind.
